name: Kokiris
description:
Kokiris live under ground. Help this one to pass the challenge!

You must balance the floor using precious stones. Be care, they have different sizes!

This  is  our first  game   in Ludum Dare 

I  hope   you  enjoy it.

PD:   The more you have, the worse it is 

Made  With

Daniel Soto https://sdflogan.itch.io/

Jonathan Rodriguez https://jnyrr5.itch.io/

Miguel Lima https://miguel-lima.itch.io/
